definition: stupid/sluggish/clumsy/to wiggle (of worms)/to move in a disorderly fashion

sentences.english: Only stupidest cry and fools die .
sentences.chinese: 只有傻瓜蠢蛋才会哭着喊着要去死。

sentences.english: These must be some illiterate ignorant and clueless Senators.
sentences.chinese: 这些参议员肯定是文盲蠢蛋毫无头绪的。

sentences.english: I bet 10-15 years from now, these fools will shut up.
sentences.chinese: 我打赌15年后，这些蠢蛋就会闭嘴。

sentences.english: Lets hope the damage is limited to the nut who blew themselves up.
sentences.chinese: 让我们期待伤害就只有蠢蛋爆炸者自己。

sentences.english: B: We're in a library, you dork.
Duh, this is tape, you dork.
Hi, Boner, you're a real funny guy.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，蠢蛋，你真是个有趣的家伙。

sentences.english: Well too bad for him, this fool still loves the stuff.
sentences.chinese: 糟糕透了，那个蠢蛋还是喜欢这种吃法。

sentences.english: What fool has put that wet paintbrush on my chair?
sentences.chinese: 哪个蠢蛋把未干的画笔放在我的椅子上？

sentences.english: My team is a bunch of knuckleheads, I admit.
sentences.chinese: 我的小组是一群蠢蛋，我承认。

sentences.english: A president who treats his people like idiots ?
sentences.chinese: “你们见过一个把人民当蠢蛋来欺骗的总统吗？”。
那个蠢蛋什么时候才能学乖？

sentences.english: Cons who go over the wall are stupid cons.
sentences.chinese: 想翻墙越狱的囚犯是蠢蛋。

sentences.english: He was a total jerk in real life. MMT
sentences.chinese: 但在现实生活中他完全就是个蠢蛋。

sentences.english: Without a doubtthis BOZO is the WORST excuse for a president in this countrys history.
sentences.chinese: 毋庸置疑这个蠢蛋是这个国家历史上最糟糕的总统。
